description: TickTick is a cross-platform task management and to-do list application designed to help users organize their tasks and schedules efficiently.

capabilities.name: TICKTICK_COMPLETE_TASK
capabilities.description: Tool to mark a task as complete. Use after confirming the task is done.

capabilities.name: TICKTICK_CREATE_PROJECT
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new project in TickTick. Use when you need to programmatically add a project after obtaining a valid access token.

capabilities.name: TICKTICK_CREATE_TASK
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new task in TickTick. Use after you have task details such as title, dates, and optional reminders or subtasks.

capabilities.name: TICKTICK_DELETE_PROJECT
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific project. Use when you have confirmed the project ID and intend to permanently remove it. Example: "Delete the project with ID 6226ff9877acee87727f6bca".

capabilities.name: TICKTICK_DELETE_TASK
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific task. Use when you need to remove a task from a project after confirming both project and task IDs.

capabilities.name: TICKTICK_GET_PROJECT_WITH_DATA
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a project and its associated data (tasks, columns). Use when you need full project details including its tasks and columns after selecting a project ID.

capabilities.name: TICKTICK_GET_USER_PROJECT
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve all projects for the user. Use when you need to list available projects for selection.

capabilities.name: TICKTICK_OAUTH2_AUTHORIZATION_STEP1
capabilities.description: Tool to generate the TickTick OAuth2 authorization URL. Use to redirect the user to obtain the authorization code (step 1).

capabilities.name: TICKTICK_OAUTH2_AUTHORIZATION_STEP_1
capabilities.description: Tool to redirect user to TickTick authorization page to obtain authorization code. Use when initiating the OAuth2 flow before exchanging the code.

capabilities.name: TICKTICK_UPDATE_PROJECT
capabilities.description: Tool to update an existing project. Use when you need to modify project details like name, color, sort order, view mode, or kind after selecting a project ID.

capabilities.name: TICKTICK_UPDATE_TASK
capabilities.description: Tool to update an existing task. Use after confirming the taskId and projectId.
